body.p:
The State of Ohio
Clermont County SS

Be it Remembered that on this 4th Day of April in the Year 1863 Before me the undersigned personally Appeared Peter. H. Hastings of the villiage of Felicity in the State of Ohio who made Solemn oath that he would Support the Constitution of the State of Kentucky and that as Commissioner of Deeds in and for Said State of Kentucky he would well and truly Execute and perform all the Duties. Of his Station faithfully and impartially according to the Best of his Skill and understanding
Sworn to and Subscribed before me the Day and year first above written
I hereby Certify that the foregoing is a true Copy of the Affidavit Endorsed ofn the Back of the Commission of Peter, H, Hastings as Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky

This 8th Day of April A D 1863
Marcus Lee J. P.
Duplicate of Affidavit of Peter, H, Hastings as Commissioner of Deeds of Ky
